Memorial details

Support IWM

Donate with

Any gift we receive makes a vital contribution to our ongoing work, from conserving our collection to supporting our public programme.

Current location

Christ Church

Broad Town Road

Broad Town

North Wiltshire

Wiltshire

SN4 7RE

England

OS Grid Ref: SU 08971 78196

Denomination: Church of England

View location on Google Maps

Description

A wooden triptych. The centre section has a metal crucifix cross and lists the names of the men who died in both WW1 and WW2. On the inside of the two wooden doors are the lists of the men who served and returned from WW1. There is an additional small plaque fixed to the outside bottom right hand side of the triptych.

Inscription

FOR GOD, KING & COUNTRY/ GREATER LOVE HATH NO MAN THAN THIS/ (Names)/ 1939-1945/ (Names)/ THE HEROIC DEAD/ Left hand door: ROLL OF HONOUR/ (Names) Right hand door: ROLL OF HONOUR/ (Names) Metal plaque: Made from timber removed from HMS BRITANNIA cadet training ship at Dartmouth 1869 - 1905

Inscription legible?

yes
